title: Nothing Ear(a) Wireless Earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation, Bass Boost Algorithm and Up to 42.5 Hours of Listening Time - Black
description: Powerful 11mm Driver: We've made our driver even more compact. With dual power than Ear (2), Ear (a) delivers even deeper bass performance. The extra space gives sound waves more space to vibrate. With two new valves, the airflow inside the knob improves For less distortion and richer overall clarity

Smart Active Noise Cancellation: Up to 45 dB, no ear (a) automatically checks for noise leakage between the earbud and ear canal, and then apply more noise reduction to make up. So you get the best possible noise reduction. Happens every time you put them in. So you can walk from quiet rooms to busy streets without hearing anything (other than what is played)

Clear voice technology: Clear like day. Ear (a) isolates your voice from everyday distractions so that on-the-go calls feel like face-to-face conversations. With a new talc microphone and extra airway on the stem for the wind to pass through, we have reduced interference by 60% compared to ear (2)

Long playtime, quick charge: For quick power ups, the ear (a) can be fast charged for 10 minutes and deliver 10 hours of music playback (with ANC switched off). Compared to ears (2), ears(a) can provide 40.5% more continuous playtime on a single charge. Or put the earbuds back into the case and stretch your listening time to over 42.5 hours (with ANC switched off), Playback with ANC on: Up to 24.5 hours with case and 5.5 hours with just knobs, ANC off talk time: Up to 23 hours with case and 5.2 hours with knobs only

More performance: Low team mode, reduced sound delay for better gaming. Automatically triggered in game mode on a no-phone With end-to-end latency of less than 120 meters. Stay connected to two devices at the same time. Play music on your laptop then switch seamlessly to answer a call on your phone. Simple. Adaptive ANC, next level escapism. Switch between 3 levels of noise reduction. Or let your ear (a) take control. By selecting "Adaptive" in the Nothing X app, Ear (a) automatically applies the right level of noise cancellation depending on your surroundings in real time

ChatGPT, integrated: Ask , listen and learn from ChatGPT on the go. A first-class integration, made for your nothing ecosystem. Use your voice to access the ChatGPT on-ear and ear (a), wherever you are. Configure via the Nothing X app. Get the answers you need faster and close at hand. Text, voice or image search directly from the home screen (only on nothing earbuds when connected to nothing phones.)

title: Apple AirPods Max Wireless Over-Ear Headphones, Pro-Level Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency Mode, Personalized Spatial Audio, USB-C Charging, Bluetooth Headphones for iPhone ‚Äì Starlight
description: ULTIMATE OVER-EAR LISTENING EXPERIENCE‚ÄîApple-designed dynamic driver provides high-fidelity audio. Computational audio combines custom acoustic design with the Apple H1 chip and software for breakthrough listening experiences like Lossless Audio with ultra-low latency over USB-C.*
FIVE FRESH COLOURS‚ÄîAirPods Max come in five fresh colours: Midnight, Starlight, Blue, Purple and Orange. A colour-matched Smart Case is also included.
FOCUS ON WHAT‚ÄôS PLAYING‚ÄîPro-level Active Noise Cancellation removes up to 2x more background noise, so you can immerse yourself in music.
HEAR THE WORLD AROUND YOU‚ÄîTransparency mode lets you comfortably hear and interact with the world around you.

PERSONALIZED SPATIAL AUDIO‚ÄîWith sound that suits your unique ear shape along with dynamic head tracking, AirPods Max deliver an immersive listening experience that places sound all around you. You can also listen to select songs, shows and movies in Dolby Atmos.
ACOUSTIC-FIRST DESIGN ‚Äî Designed with a knit-mesh canopy and memory foam ear cushions for an exceptional over-ear fit that perfectly seals in sound.

MAGICAL EXPERIENCE ‚Äî Pair AirPods Max by simply placing them near your device and tapping Connect on your screen. AirPods Max pause audio when you take them off. And Automatic Switching makes listening between your iPhone, iPad and Mac completely effortless.

title: Fujifilm X100VI Digital Camera - Black
description: Higher Resolution, Higher Freedom: Make unforgettable content with the portable and lightweight FUJIFILM X100VI digital camera. Fusing a classic, tactile dial-based design with Fujifilm‚Äôs most advanced digital imaging technology, delivering 1.5x more resolution than the predecessor X100V model, at almost twice the speed. Take control over exposure with the internal 4-stop ND, move closer to the action with 1.4x and 2x digital teleconverters.

Fast AF, any Questions?: Be ready for every creative moment with X100VI‚Äôs state-of-the-art autofocus (AF) system. By harnessing the power of its new X-Processor 5 image processing engine, the camera uses a state-of-the-art AF algorithm and deep-learning AI technology to broaden the range of subjects it can recognize. This enables X100VI to accurately track objects, even in low-light conditions when unpredictability can be the difference between getting the image, or missing it.

Keep Your Creativity Moving: When the light is low and the stakes are high, X100VI ensures photos stay sharp and videos stable thanks to the up to 6 stop in-body image stabilization (IBIS) system. Internal gyro sensors minimize the impact of camera shake for those critical moments by detecting movements and vibrations across five axes.

Cloud Collaboration Made Easy: Create, share and collaborate in an instant with X100VI‚Äôs native Frame.io Camera to Cloud technology. Wirelessly connect to an active internet connection, authenticate to Frame.io, and start uploading photos and videos at the moment of creation.

Professional Reels in the Palm of Your Hand: Stay versatile! In addition to 40MP stills, X100VI delivers professional quality video straight out of camera in resolutions up to 6.2K/30P and 4K/60P. On-the-go content creators can also use one of Fujifilm‚Äôs 20 built-in unique Film Simulation modes, including the new REALA ACE, and take control with two F-Log options to maximize flexibility in post-production workflows.

title: Apple AirPods Pro 2 Wireless Earbuds, Bluetooth Headphones, Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency, Personalized Spatial Audio, High-Fidelity Sound, H2 Chip, USB-C Charging
description: ADVANCED HEARING HEALTH FEATURES ‚Äî Hearing Protection works across listening modes and features like pro-level Active Noise Cancellation, Conversation Awareness and more to help protect your hearing for daily life.

INTELLIGENT NOISE CONTROL ‚Äî Active Noise Cancellation removes up to 2x more background noise.* Transparency mode lets you hear the world around you, and Adaptive Audio seamlessly blends Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode for the best listening experience in any environment.* And when you‚Äôre speaking with someone nearby, Conversation Awareness automatically lowers the volume of what‚Äôs playing.*

IMPROVED SOUND AND CALL QUALITY ‚Äî The Apple-designed H2 chip helps to create deeply immersive sound. The low-distortion, custom-built driver delivers crisp, clear high notes and full, rich bass in stunning definition. Voice Isolation improves the quality of phone calls in loud conditions.*

CUSTOMIZABLE FIT ‚Äî Includes four pairs of silicone tips (XS, S, M, L) to fit a wide range of ear shapes and provide all-day comfort. The tips create an acoustic seal to help keep out noise and secure AirPods Pro 2 in place.
DUST-, SWEAT- AND WATER-RESISTANT ‚Äî Both AirPods Pro and the MagSafe Charging Case are IP54 dust-, sweat- and water-resistant, so you can listen comfortably in more conditions.*

PERSONALIZED SPATIAL AUDIO ‚Äî With sound that suits your unique ear shape along with dynamic head tracking, AirPods Pro 2 deliver an immersive listening experience that places sound all around you.* You can also listen to select songs, shows and movies in Dolby Atmos.

A HIGHER LEVEL OF CONTROL ‚Äî Simply swipe, press and hold the stem to manage playback functions using Touch control. And with Siri Interactions, simply nod your head yes or shake your head no when Siri asks if you‚Äôd like to hear a message, answer a call or manage a notification.*
